name: Johnson's Apple Orchard
description: Family-owned apple orchard since 1985. Pick your own apples in our beautiful 50-acre orchard. Perfect for families! We offer wagon rides, a petting zoo, and fresh apple cider donuts made daily.

name: Heritage Berry Farm
description: Third-generation family berry farm specializing in premium strawberries, blueberries, and raspberries. Pick your own or buy pre-picked. Farm store features fresh baked pies, jams, and preserves.

name: Maple Ridge Christmas Tree Farm
description: Premium Christmas tree farm with over 30 years of experience. Choose and cut your perfect tree from our selection of fresh Balsam Fir, Fraser Fir, and Noble Fir. Free tree netting and loading assistance.

name: Sunny Acres Pumpkin Patch
description: California's premier pumpkin patch and fall destination! 25 acres of pumpkins, plus corn maze, hay rides, and family fun activities. Perfect pumpkins for carving, cooking, and decorating.
